resources.string: Bluetooth Low Energy not supported in this mobile

1. Put your hands around the Zteero device.

2. Make sure your palms are in contact with the electrodes as you can see on the image.

3. Press CONNECT to establish communication with the Zteero device.

4. When the device is connected you can start the measurement!

Zteero is a personal monitoring device that allows one to measure one\'s heart and breathing rate in real time or record the heart rate for later study. It is largely used by performers of various types of physical exercise.\n\n Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Aenean sagittis faucibus maximus. Phasellus sed viverra dolor.
